DOC.brief_title: Misoprostol Prior Intrauterine Device ( IUD ) Insertion Nulliparous Women
DOC.detailed_description: There currently 2 intrauterine device ( IUDs ) available U.S. , copper T380 ( paragard ) levonorgestrel IUD ( Mirena ) . The effectiveness IUDs similar tubal sterilization [ 1 ] , overall unintended pregnancy rate le 1 % first year , low failure rate subsequent year . The cervix nulliparous woman small diameter lead difficult uncomfortable IUD insertion . Because misoprostol 's know ability cause cervical dilation , family planning provider give patient dose drug prior insertion . The goal study evaluate whether misoprostol prior IUD insertion nulliparous woman ease insertion decrease pain . The null hypothesis misoprostol influence difficulty insertion patient perception pain . The primary outcome ability insert IUD without dilation cervix use ultrasound guidance .
